[1] (b) Luaigh aon bhuntáiste amháin a bhaineann leis an néalríomhaireacht. [1] (c) Liostaigh dhá riosca fhéideartha a bhaineann leis an néalríomhaireacht. 1. 2. [2]
ocr_Bearla: Many web-based email accounts use cloud computing technology. (a) State what is meant by the term cloud computing. (b) Give one advantage of cloud computing. (c) List two potential risks with cloud computing. 1. 2. [1] [1] [2]
ocr_freagra: (a) "Key is through the Internet. or named Cloud storage"   Cloud computing is storing/accessing data or programs through   the Internet   (b) Any one from:   [1]   Remote global access to files [1] Collaborative working [1]   Don't need large servers [1] Share files [1] Cost [1] Software updates [1]   Backup and recovery [1] Unlimited storage [1]   Reduce carbon footprint   [1]   (c) Any two from:   Security issues [1] data stored in cloud at risk to hackers [1]   Viruses uploaded to cloud could destroy data [1] Spread viruses [1]   Potential downtime [1] Band width limitations [1]   [2]
